source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.
source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts

items.title: Origami, Japanese Paper crafts ‐ Challenge course 2
items.headline: Origami basic course. You can learn 25 types of origami from easy to slightly difficult in an easy-to-understand manner
objectives_summary: 25 Let's learn how to make origami
Basic way to fold origami
Communication using origami

items.title: Watercolor gardens, how to paint in FREE style step by step.

visible_instructors.title: David Walker
visible_instructors.name: David
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional artist based in North Wales and painting Tutor

items.headline: Learn how to paint these 3 watercolor gardens from the start.Following easy lessons, in a wet in wet style, with a pro.
objectives_summary: In the first of 3 watercolors we learn how to paint a wet in wet Laburnum arch in a really freestyle way.
In the second of 3 watercolors we learn how to paint wet in wet a beautiful garden in a really freestyle way.
In the third of 3 watercolors we learn how to paint wet in wet poppies in a really freestyle way.

items.title: Jewelry Making: All Types of Tassel Earrings From Scratch

visible_instructors.title: Margarita Petersone
visible_instructors.name: Margarita
visible_instructors.job_title: Creative jewelry designer. Video tutorials and useful tips.

items.headline: Learn from the ground up with the easy to follow videos. The course is regularly updated
objectives_summary: Make your very own tassel earrings from scratch. Thread, Feather, Crystal, Chain Tassels
Tips & Tricks gathered throughout the years to ease the process
Create tassels of different length

items.title: From Vintage Book to Handmade Journal - A Cheat's Guide

visible_instructors.name: Nina
visible_instructors.title: Nina Vangerow
visible_instructors.job_title: Artist & Creator at The Forgotten Bookshop Girl

items.headline: In this class I'm going to show you how you can turn a vintage book (or in fact any hardcover book) into a hand made jou
objectives_summary: In this class students are going to learn how to chose the right book that will work for this project, how to safely remove the original pages, how to cut new pages and  add them to the journal.

items.title: Impressionism: Paint this Reclining Figure in Oil or Acrylic
items.headline: Learn Impressionism techniques by creating this reclining figure painting. For total beginner through advanced painters.
objectives_summary: Create an entire painting in one sitting
Understand Impressionism and why it is so powerful
Understand how light works to make things look the way they do, and how to translate that into your paintings

items.title: The Beauty of Portrait Drawing - The Profile View
items.headline: From Italy with Love
objectives_summary: To draw a beautiful and realistic profile portrait
The structure of the skull , seen from the lateral point of view
Head muscles, seen from the side

items.title: Marco Barucco’s Pencil Drawing Basics
items.headline: Unlock your Creativity
objectives_summary: The REAL basics of drawing
How to free your INTUITIVE DRAWING ability
How to reproduce what you see with EXTREME PRECISION

items.title: Advanced Swirling Soapmaking 2
items.headline: Learn advanced swirling techniques in soapmaking
objectives_summary: Review intermediate skills
Learn to create the Mantra and divider swirl alternatives
Learn to feather soap tops

items.title: MeenaKari Painting: Ancient Persian art and Relief Painting
items.headline: Indian folk art with stone, outliner, glass glossy metal gold emboss coloring. Type of ancient persian art/ relief art
objectives_summary: Acrylic painting
Craft
Drawing

items.title: Learn to Wire Wrap A RING from Scratch!
items.headline: Beginner/Intermediate
objectives_summary: How to make an intermediate wire wrapped ring

items.title: Learn how to paint Byzantine Icons (Part 4)
items.headline: Byzantine icons from scratch
objectives_summary: Learn how to paint in the byzantine style.
Recognise the byzantine painting style.
Learn how to paint icons from the beginning.

items.title: One stroke painting for Beginners and Intermediate level
items.headline: Basic materials , warmup strokes to do Anemones, Daisies, Dahlias, Magnolias, blue peonies and realistic roses
objectives_summary: Basic tips and tricks to do Onestroke painting

items.title: Laid-Back Lettering

visible_instructors.name: Amy
visible_instructors.title: Amy Stewart
visible_instructors.job_title: New York Times Bestselling Author & Artist

items.headline: For Urban Sketching, Journaling, & Everyone with Terrible Handwriting
objectives_summary: How to use rulers and guides to plan your lettering
How to make interesting lettering using your own handwriting
How to make simple letter shapes with watercolor brushes

items.title: Wire Wrapping : Jewelry Making for Beginners, Aurora Pendant
items.headline: Learn to Create Beautiful and Unique Jewellery with Wire Wrapping Techniques..Create Wire Wrap Aurora Pendant
objectives_summary: This course is the first step in learning the art of Wire wrapping. You will weave, sculpt and transform the wire to create jewelry.
Learn various 'wire weaving techniques' which can then be used to create your own jewelry pieces.
At the end of the course, you will be able to create beautiful The Aurora Pendant.

items.title: Paint a Realistic Cat in Watercolor: Inspiring Tutorial
items.headline: Step-by-step tutorial on painting a cute pet
objectives_summary: Main watercolor techniques and practical exercises to apply them
Color mixing rules, pigment theory
Color scheme creation for your particular painting

items.title: Expand Your Watercolor Painting in Japanese Style & Patterns
items.headline: Expand Your Watercolor Painting in Japanese Style & Patterns
objectives_summary: 3 different styles: Painting of the Flowers & Stones, Pattern Design and Abstract  Paintings
How to Expand Watercolor Techniques
Creating Patterns in Photoshop
